issue.title: [Python] pyarrow.array does not attempt to convert bytes to UTF8 when passed a StringType
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-1225](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-1225). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This code works in py3 but fails in py2.7

```Java
import pyarrow as pa
pa.array(['a', 'b', 'c'], type=pa.string())
```
